definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: We just need to put into practice what we already know. Be a doer of the Word.
sentences.chinese: 我們只需將所知付諸實踐，做個真正的實幹家。

sentences.english: I think the simplest definition of maturity is to be a doer of the word.You do what the Bible says.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲成熟最直接的含義就是要做個實幹家。

sentences.english: It is the unsung achiever of our prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 它可是我們的繁榮默默無聞的實幹家。

sentences.english: In every domain I can think of, the people who are the most regarded are the doers.
sentences.chinese: 在我能想到的每一領域裏，最被人看重的是實幹家。

sentences.english: They also provide a boost for you, the doer.
sentences.chinese: 他們可能會幫助你成爲一名實幹家。

sentences.english: I think I should a doer , no need to modify the beautiful words.
sentences.chinese: 我想我該當個實幹家，不需要那些美麗的詞彙來修飾。

sentences.english: People who hang out in courageousness are the doers of the world.
sentences.chinese: 達到無畏階段的人都是這世界的實幹家。

sentences.english: Pak may have been seen as the hands-on person to fix its problems.
sentences.chinese: 或許人民覺得朴鳳柱是解決朝鮮問題的實幹家。

sentences.english: Ten empty talkers are not worth one man of action.
sentences.chinese: 十個空談家，抵不上一個實幹家。

sentences.english: I think the simplest definition of maturity is to be a doer of the word. You do what the Bible says.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲成熟最直接的含義就是要做個實幹家。

sentences.english: I think the simplest definition of maturity is to be a doer of the word.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲成熟最直接的含義就是要做個實幹家。

sentences.english: Life is a lot more fun as a Doer than a Talker.
sentences.chinese: 做一個實幹家比當一個空談者要有趣的多。

sentences.english: I’ve become a Talker instead of a Doer.
sentences.chinese: 我成了一個空談者，而非實幹家。
